text: Bisternalis mexicanus female The Laelapidae are a family of mites in the order Mesostigmata. The family is also referred to in the literature as Laelaptidae, which may be the correct spelling. ==Genera== * Aetholaelaps Strandtmann & Camin, 1956 * Alphalaelaps Radford, 1951 * Andreacarus Radford, 1953 * Androlaelaps Berlese, 1903 * Angosomaspis Costa, 1971 * Atricholaelaps Ewing, 1929 * Austrolaelaps Womersley, 1956 * Berlesia G.Canestrini, 1884 * Bewsiella Domrow, 1958 * Bisternalis Hunter, 1963 * Blaberolaelaps M.
